resources.string: Enter the OTP we\'ve sent to \n \u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020 +91
Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested
No need to struggle with cash anymore for your bus tickets
Enjoy cashbacks and offers for future payments.

Akkad Plus is an innovative Android application developed by Mohammed Adel Saif Othman Al-Mohammadi, a Computer Engineering student at Sana'a University. Designed as a final year project, Akkad Plus aims to revolutionize bus commuting experiences.

Akkad Plus offers a range of features to simplify your bus commuting experience:

1. Bus Search: Easily search for buses by destination or bus number.

2. Bus Stop Search: Locate individual bus stops and discover which buses are available.

3. Algorithmic Selection: Advanced algorithms determine eligible buses for your journey.

4. Dynamic Pricing: Sophisticated formulas calculate ticket prices accurately.
At Akkad Plus, our mission is to simplify bus commuting and enhance the overall experience for users through innovative technology solutions.

Have questions or feedback? Contact us at:
Email: moh734953951@gmail.com
Phone: +967734953951

Thank you for choosing Akkad Plus.

Akkad Plus is developed by Mohammed Adel Saif Othman Al-Mohammadi, a Computer Engineering student at Sana'a University. With passion for technology and commitment to innovation, this application was created to improve bus commuting experiences.
